Instruction type

Flags to define the type of instruction



#define COMEDI_INSN_READ   (0 | COMEDI_INSN_MASK_READ)
 Read instruction.
#define COMEDI_INSN_WRITE   (1 | COMEDI_INSN_MASK_WRITE)
 Write instruction.
#define COMEDI_INSN_BITS
 "Bits" instruction
#define COMEDI_INSN_CONFIG
 Configuration instruction.
#define COMEDI_INSN_GTOD
 Get time instruction.
#define COMEDI_INSN_WAIT
 Wait instruction.
#define COMEDI_INSN_INTTRIG
 Trigger instruction (to start asynchronous acquisition).

Defines

#define COMEDI_INSN_WAIT_MAX   100000
 Maximal wait duration.

Function Documentation

int comedi_snd_insn (  comedi_desc_t *  dsc,
comedi_insn_t *  arg
) 
 

Perform a synchronous acquisition misc operation.

The function comedi_snd_insn() triggers a synchronous acquisition.

Parameters:
[in] dsc Device descriptor filled by comedi_open() (and optionally comedi_fill_desc())
[in] arg Instruction structure
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise a negative error code.

int comedi_snd_insnlist (  comedi_desc_t *  dsc,
comedi_insnlst_t *  arg
) 
 

Perform a list of synchronous acquisition misc operations.

The function comedi_snd_insnlist() is able to send many synchronous instructions on a various set of subdevices, channels, etc.

Parameters:
[in] dsc Device descriptor filled by comedi_open() (and optionally comedi_fill_desc())
[in] arg Instructions list structure
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise a negative error code.
